radiographic_examinations.findings: At 2 hours after 100 mg of oral sildenaﬁl, significant variations from baseline in parameters of best-fit Naka-Rushton function; Vmax was notably higher, and K was 0.14 log units lower than baseline.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison of parameters between values at baseline, 1 hour, and 2 hours after oral ingestion of 100 mg sildenaﬁl showed a significant difference for Vmax, K, and h. At 2 hours, Vmax was 63.1% higher in the right eye and 36.5% in the left eye compared to baseline. K was smaller at 2 hours.
